overview: 611: American Icon is the story of the most famous steam passenger locomotive in the world. Exclusive restoration footage takes you inside the locomotive's massive boiler and firebox, the cab and iconic nose, interviews with the restoration team and historians give you the eye-opening insights to 611's superior engineering. Rare historical footage tells the story of the famous Norfolk & Western Shops and how the 611 became an enduring survivor loved by millions around the world.
tagline: The Story of the Last Norfolk & Western Class J Steam Locomotive
title: 611: American Icon
